entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as being twice as tall as anyone else in the town and is pointed out by passers-by.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as running to keep up with Hagrid and is asked if he still has his letter.

relationships.description: Hagrid points at parking meters saying 'See that, Harry? Things these Muggles dream up, eh?'
Hagrid mentions that there are dragons at Gringotts.
Hagrid and Harry take a train to London.
